body_content.explanation: a member of a group of people from the steppes (= large areas of land with grass but no trees) of Eastern Europe, known as brave fighters and good horse riders:
examples: The Cossacks were a semi-nomadic people.
Millions of people across the world declare Cossack ethnicity.

body_content.explanation: a member of a military unit made up of people from this group:
examples: He had several thousand Cossacks under his command.
The forces included tanks and Cossack cavalry.
